quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因"scatter"(分散)和"brain"(大脑)的字面组合，误将"scatterbrained"理解为"思维敏捷的"或"多才多艺的"。
quiz_item.sentence: My sister is so **scatterbrained** that she forgot her keys three times this week and even left her phone in the supermarket yesterday.

option.definition: 心不在焉的；丢三落四的
思维敏捷的；多才多艺的
混乱的；无组织的（形容事物）
